item.title: 南非审查通胀目标以维护物价稳定
item.description: 南非财政部副部长戴维-马松多表示，南非正在对央行 3% 至 6% 的通胀目标进行审查，这一审查将以保持物价稳定为原则。【原文：South Africa’s ongoing review of the central bank’s inflation target of 3% to 6% will be anchored in the principle of preserving price stability, said Deputy Finance Minister David Masondo.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司准备重振使巴西成为石油巨人的油田
item.description: 巴西国有控股石油公司即将与政府监管机构达成协议，允许该公司推进重新开发一个大型深水油田的计划，这将重振巴西停滞不前的石油产量。【原文：Brazil’s state-controlled oil company is nearing a deal with government regulators allowing it to move forward with plans to redevelop a massive deep-water field that could reinvigorate the nation’s stalled output.】

item.title: 斯坦霍夫前财务主管的审判推迟至 2025 年初
item.description: 南非一家法院将起诉 Steinhoff International Holdings NV 前财务主管的案件推迟到 2 月 14 日，因为当地政府正在努力应对七年前导致这家全球零售商濒临倒闭的会计丑闻的余波。【原文：The case against Steinhoff International Holdings NV’s former head of treasury was postponed until Feb. 14 by a South African court as local authorities grapple with the fallout of an accounting scandal that led to the near-collapse of the global retailer seven years ago.】

item.title: 就业数据打击债券，交易员打消对美联储大幅减息的押注
item.description: 在美国 9 月份就业数据超过预期并显示出强劲的招聘趋势后，交易员们削减了对美联储未来降息步伐的押注。【原文：Traders slashed their bets on the pace of future Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts after September US employment data blew past estimates and signaled a robust hiring trend.】

item.title: 阿波罗的 Zelter 说，私人信贷在经济衰退时将表现出色
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc）联席总裁詹姆斯-泽尔特（James Zelter）在接受彭博电台采访时说，在经济衰退时，私人信贷的表现将 "远远超过 "高收益和杠杆贷款市场。【原文：Private credit will “wildly outperform” the high-yield and leveraged loan markets in a recession, James Zelter, co-president of Apollo Global Management Inc. said in an interview on Bloomberg Radio.】

item.title: 欧洲电动汽车关税举措给汽车投资者带来更多苦难
item.description: 欧盟投票决定对来自中国的电动汽车征收关税后，汽车制造商的股价温和反弹，但这并不能缓解该行业投资者今年的低迷情绪。【原文：A mild rally in the shares of automakers after the European Union voted to impose tariffs on electric vehicles from China does little to alleviate a bleak year for the sector’s investors.】

item.title: 北卡罗来纳州石英矿矿主称海伦事件造成的损失很小
item.description: 北卡罗来纳州的一个石英矿是全球半导体制造中使用的高纯度石英的重要来源，该矿的矿主表示，在飓风 "海伦 "袭击后，该矿的运营只遭受了轻微损失。【原文：The owner of a North Carolina quartz mine that’s a key source for high-purity quartz used in global semiconductor manufacturing said its operations sustained only minor damage in the wake of Hurricane Helene.】

item.title: 加纳与国际货币基金组织（IMF）达成员工级别协议，再融资 3.6 亿美元
item.description: 加纳即将从国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）再次获得 3.6 亿美元的付款，因为加纳与总部位于华盛顿的贷款方就扩大信贷机制计划的第三次审查达成了工作人员级别的协议。【原文：Ghana is close to receiving another $360 million disbursement from the International Monetary Fund as it reached a staff-level agreement with the Washington-based lender on the third review of an extended credit facility program.】

item.title: 肯尼亚要求国际货币基金组织（IMF）审计导致财政瘫痪的腐败问题

item.description: 由于全球需求下降，世界头号葡萄酒生产国法国获得了欧盟 1.2 亿欧元（1.32 亿美元）的资助，用于提升本国的一片葡萄园。【原文：France, the world’s top wine producer, secured European Union funding of €120 million ($132 million) to pull up a slice of the country’s vineyards as global demand declines.】

item.title: 德国、法国和意大利敦促欧盟放松银行业监管
item.description: 德国、法国和意大利敦促欧盟在制定金融规则时表现出克制，转而专注于提高其银行业的竞争力，这是全球政治转向经济增长优先于监管的最新迹象。【原文：Germany, France and Italy urged the European Union to show restraint in financial rule making and instead focus on boosting the competitiveness of its banking sector, the latest sign of a global political shift to prioritize economic growth over regulation.】

item.title: Springbok 橄榄球版权所有者将投票决定将股权出售给 Ackerley
item.description: 负责监管卫冕世界冠军 Springboks 队的南澳橄榄球队表示，其成员工会将于 10 月 17 日就出售新成立的商业版权公司 20% 的股份给 Ackerley 体育集团一事进行投票。【原文：SA Rugby, which oversees the reigning world champion Springboks team, said its member unions will on Oct. 17 vote on the sale of a 20% stake in a newly created commercial rights company to Ackerley Sports Group.】

item.description: 欧洲汽车制造商正在努力应对大量涌入的廉价中国电动汽车。在对中国政府向其汽车行业发放补贴进行调查后，欧盟于 10 月 4 日投票决定对从中国进口的电动汽车征收高达 45% 的关税。【原文：Help is on the way for European carmakers struggling to deal with an influx of cheap Chinese electric vehicles. item.title: Coinbase 将于 12 月在欧盟退市不合规的稳定币
item.description: Coinbase Global Inc.将在年底前将所有未经授权的稳定币从其在欧洲经济区的加密货币交易所除名，这对 Tether Holdings Ltd. 的 USDT 等代币来说是一个潜在的打击。【原文：Coinbase Global Inc. will delist all unauthorized stablecoins from its crypto exchange in the European Economic Area by year-end, a potential blow for tokens like Tether Holdings Ltd.’s USDT.】

item.title: 干邑生产商谴责电动车关税投票引发报复恐惧

item.title: 爱尔兰监管机构正在审查瑞安航空公司的客户数据处理流程
item.description: 瑞安航空控股公司（Ryanair Holdings Plc）对个人数据的处理将接受爱尔兰数据保护监管机构的审查，因为一些客户投诉该航空公司要求对在第三方订票网站上购买的机票进行额外的身份验证。【原文：Ryanair Holdings Plc’s processing of personal data will be reviewed by Ireland’s data protection regulator after some customers complained about the airline asking for additional identity verification for tickets bought on third-party booking websites.】

item.title: 印度财政部长预计人均收入将增长近一倍
item.description: 印度财政部长尼尔马拉-西塔拉曼（Nirmala Sitharaman）表示，随着经济的持续增长，印度的人均收入将在五年内翻一番，同时她也警告说，现在的全球环境比过去更加严峻。【原文：India’s Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman said income per person will almost double in five years time as the economy continues to grow, while warning that the global environment is tougher now than it was in the past.】

item.title: 即使禁令解除，土耳其仍将对小麦进口实施部分限制
item.description: 根据彭博社看到的一份文件，土耳其计划在本月结束为期四个月的禁购令后，继续限制部分小麦进口。【原文：Turkey plans to continue limiting some wheat imports when its four-month ban on purchases ends this month, according to a document seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 现代汽车据称将在印度最大 IPO 中寻求 190 亿美元的价值
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，现代汽车公司正在为其印度分公司的首次公开募股寻求 190 亿美元的估值，这可能是该公司在印度最大的一次股票出售。【原文：Hyundai Motor Co. is seeking a valuation of $19 billion for the initial public offering of its India unit, people familiar with the matter said, in what could be the nation’s biggest share sale.】
